resources.string:
TaleWorlds Entertainment is an independent video game development company located in Ankara, Turkey. 
Founded in 2005 by Armağan Yavuz after starting work in game development as a hobby. 
Known for its leading Mount&Blade game franchise, TaleWorlds is one of the most successful indie developers worldwide. 
The studio also grew with the game, and is continuing to add talented graphics artists and programmers to its core team. 
The team is currently developing the much anticipated sequel; Mount&Blade 2: Bannerlord. 
Release date is yet to be announced.
Galyum Blok, ODTÜ Teknokent Ankara, Tr 06531
Mount & Blade Warband: With Fire and Sword
Mount & Blade Warband: Viking Conquest Reforged Edition
